phrases: Water.
Earth.
Fire.
Air.
Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
Those clouds look so soft, do not they?
Like you could just jump down and you would land in a big, soft cottony heap.
Maybe you should give it a try.
You are hilarious.
I will try it!
Yehhh!
Turns out clouds are made of water!
Hey, what is that?
It is like a scar.
Listen, it is so quiet.
There is no life anywhere.
Aang, are you okay?
Fire Nation!
Those evil savages make me sick!
They have no respect for...
Shh!
What?
I am not allowed to be angry?
Why would anyone do this?
How could I let this happen?
Aang, you did not let this happen.
It has nothing to do with you.
Yes it does.
It is the Avatar's job to protect nature.
But, I do not know how to do my job.
That is why we are going to the North Pole to find you a teacher.
Yeh, a waterbending teacher,...
Monk Gyatso said that Avatar Roku would help me.
The Avatar before you?
He died over a hundred years ago, how are you supposed to talk to him?
I do not know.
Uncle!
It is time to leave!
Where are you?
Uncle Iroh!
Over here.
Uncle?
We need to move on, we are closing in on the Avatar's trail and I do not want to lose him!
You look tired, Prince Zuko.
Why do not you join me in these hot springs and soak away your troubles.
My troubles cannot be soaked away.
It is time to go!
You should take your teacher's advice and relax a little.
The temperature's just right.
I heated it myself.
Enough!
We need to leave now!
Get out of the water!
Very well.
On second thought, why do not you take another few minutes,...
Hey Aang, are you ready to be cheered up?
No.
Hey, how was that cheering me up?
Cheered me up.
Ow!
Yeh, I probably deserved that.
These acorns are everywhere, Aang.
That means the forest will grow back.
Every one of these will be a tall oak tree someday,...
Thanks, Katara.
Hey, who are you?
When I saw the flying bison, I thought it was impossible,...
My village desperately needs your help.
This young person is the Avatar.
So the rumors of your return are true.
It is the greatest honor of a lifetime to be in your presence.
Nice to meet you too.
So... is there something I can help you with?
I am not sure...
Our village is in crisis, he is our only hope.
For the last few days at sunset a spirit monster comes and attacks our village.
He is Hei-Bai, the black and white spirit.
Why is it attacking you?
We do not know, but each of the last three nights he has abducted one of our own.
We are especially fearful because the winter solstice draws near.
What happens then?
As the solstice approaches, the natural world and the spirit world...
Hei-Bai is already causing devastation and destruction.
Once the solstice is here there is no telling what will happen.
So, what do you want me to do exactly?
Who better to resolve a crisis between our world and the spirit world...
Right... that is me.
Hey, great bridge guy', can I talk to you over here for a second?
Aang, you seem a little unsure about all this.
Yeh, that might be because I do not know anything at all about the spirit world.
It is not like there is someone to teach me this stuff!
So, can you help these people?
I have to try, do not I?
Maybe whatever I have to do will just... come to me.
I think you can do it, Aang.
Yehhh, we are all going to get eaten by a spirit monster.
Who is there?
A meadow vole!
I should have known.
You startled me, little one.
Ehh, seems I have dozed off and missed my nephew's deadline,...
He is a Fire Nation soldier.
He is no ordinary soldier.
This is the Fire Lord's brother, the Dragon of the West,...
Hello?
Spirit, can you hear me?
This is the Avatar speaking.
I am... here to try to help stuff.
This is not right.
We cannot sit here and cower while Aang waits for some monster to show up.
If anyone can save us, he can.
He still should not have to face this alone.
The sun has set.
Where are you, Hei-Bai?
Well, spirit, uh, I hereby ask you to please leave this village in peace!
Okay.
Well, I guess that is settled then.
You must be the Hei-Bai spirit.
My name is...
My name is Aang!
I am the Avatar and I would like to help!
Hey, wait up!
The Avatar's methods are... unusual.
It does not seem too interested in what he is saying.
Maybe we should go help him?
No, only the Avatar stands a chance against the Hei-Bai.
Aang will figure out the right thing to do, Sokka.
Please, would you stop destroying things and listen?
I am just trying to do my job as spirit bridge.
Excuse me, would you please turn around?
I command you to turn around now!
That is it!
He needs help!
Sokka wait!
It is not safe!
Hei-Bai!
Over here!
Sokka, go back!
We will fight him together, Aang.
I do not want to fight him unless I... huh!
Sokka!
Uncle!
Uncle, where are you?
Sir, maybe he thought you left without him?
Something is not right here.
That pile of rocks...
It looks like there is been a landslide, Sir.
Land does not slide uphill.
Those rocks did not move naturally.
My uncle's been captured by earthbenders!
Aang, over here!
Help!
Hang on, Sokka!
Sokka!
I failed.
Where are you taking me?
We are taking you to face justice.
Right.
But where, specifically?
A place you are quite familiar with, actually.
You once laid siege to it for 600 days, but it would not yield to you.
Ah!
The great city of Ba Sing Se.
It was greater than you were, apparently.
I acknowledged my defeat at Ba Sing Se!
After 600 days away from home, my men were tired and I was tired,...
I am sure they will be back.
I know.
You should get some rest.
Everything's going to be okay.
Your brother is in good hands.
I would be shocked if the Avatar returned without him.
Katara, Katara
I lost him.
The sun is rising.
Perhaps he will return soon.
What?
No, I am right here!
I am in the spirit world!
Yup, that is Uncle Iroh.
I will figure this out, Katara, I promise.
Like they said, I am the bridge between the worlds, right?
All I have to do is... figure out what I have to do.
But once I do that, no problem!
Appa!
Hey buddy, I am right here.
But, I guess you cannot see me either.
It is ok, Appa.
Do Not' worry.
I am sure they are on their way back.
I bet they even found you a bunch of moon peaches for a treat.
What am I supposed to do?
Avatar Roku, how can I talk to you?
Sokka?
That is definitely not Sokka!
What?
I cannot airbend in the spirit world!
You do not know where Sokka is, do you?
You are Avatar Roku's animal guide!
Like Appa is to me.
I need to save my friend and I do not know how.
Is there some way for me to talk to Roku?
I will be back Katara.
Take me to Roku!
What is the problem?
Nothing.
Actually, there is a bit of a problem.
My old joints are feeling sore and achy and these shackles are too loose.
Too loose?
That is right.
The cuffs are loose and they jangle around and bump my wrists.
It would help me if you would tighten them so they would not shake around so much.
Very well.
Corporal, tighten the prisoner's hand cuffs.
Hey, what are you doing!?
I do not understand.
This is just a statue of Roku.
Is that what Roku wants to talk to me about?
A comet?
When can I talk to him?
It is a calendar, and the light will reach Roku on the solstice!
So, that is when I will be able to speak to Roku?
But I cannot wait that long.
I need to save Sokka now.
He is too dangerous, Captain.
We cannot just carry him to the capital.
We have to do something now.
I agree.
He must be dealt with immediately and severely.
It is no use, Appa.
I do not see them anywhere.
Our best hope is to go back to the village and wait.
The Avatar!
You are back!
Where is Sokka?
I am not sure.
These dangerous hands must be crushed.
Excellent form, Prince Zuko.
You taught me well.
Surrender yourselves, it is five against two.
You are clearly outnumbered.
Uh, that is true, but you are clearly outmatched!
Now would you please put on some clothes!
Aang, what are you doing?
Run!
You are the spirit of this forest.
Now I understand.
You are upset and angry because your home was burned down.
When I saw the forest had burned I was sad and upset.
But my friend gave me hope that the forest would grow back.
Sokka!
What happened?
You were trapped in the Spirit world for 24 hours.
How are you feeling?
Like I seriously need to use the bathroom!
Thank you, Avatar.
If there only were a way to repay you for what you have done.
You could give us some supplies and some money.
Sokka!
What?
We need stuff.
It would be an honor to help you prepare for your journey.
I am so proud of you, Aang.
You figured out what to do all on your own.
Actually, I did have a little help.
And there is something else.
What is it?
I need to talk to Roku and I think I have found a way to contact his spirit.
That is great!
Creepy, but great.
There is a temple on a crescent shaped island,...
But, the solstice is tomorrow.
Yeh, and there is one more problem.
The island is in the Fire Nation.
